New Records: West Indies registered 51 dot balls, the most by any team in a T20 World Cup when posting a score of at least 180
Key Match Events: Phil Salt scored an unbeaten 87, Jonny Bairstow scored an unbeaten 48 as England won by 8 wickets with 15 balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-match insights were mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections were mentioned in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a fine batting deck at the Daren Sammy National Stadium
Others: Jofra Archer was consistently around the 90mph mark, Adil Rashid was the pick of the bowlers with 1 for 21 from his four overs
